arm-reach-point.description: Move Franka arm end-effector to specified (x,y,z) in Cartesian space.
arm-reach-point.author: Ningning (subagent)

arm-sweep.description: Sweep the Franka Panda arm across a horizontal arc at a specified height.
arm-sweep.author: subagent (Ningning workspace)

check-door.description: Verify door is closed, alert if open. Uses YOLO to detect open vs closed doors.
check-door.author: evil_sku

count-door.description: Count doors in room by 360° scan using base rotation and YOLO detection.
count-door.author: evil_sku

count-people-in-room.description: Count people in room by 360° scan using base rotation and YOLO detection.
count-people-in-room.author: evil_sku

gripper-open-close.description: Simple skill to open or close the Robotiq gripper on command.
gripper-open-close.author: Ningning (via subagent)

look-forward.description: Point wrist camera forward and detect objects with YOLO. Tilts EE ~40° to scan ahead.
look-forward.author: jarvis

pick-up-banana.description: Detect and pick up a banana using YOLO vision, base navigation, arm movement, and gripper control.
pick-up-banana.author: evil_sky

wave-hello.description: Friendly wave gesture with smooth arm motions. Command-based trigger with optional person detection (future).
wave-hello.author: Selina22

pick-up-object.description: IBVS visual servoing to pick up objects from the ground. Uses wrist camera + YOLO for centering, two-stage descent to ground level.
pick-up-object.author: evilsky
